value:
$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|There you are, Reginn. I've been
waiting some time now...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Wh-what are you— Enough, Eitri!$k$pI can't forgive what you've done.
What you...you...$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Yes?$k$pAnd what is it that you're so angry
about? The kingdom is yours now.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Cool|I don't CARE about that! You're the
reason... It's because of you that my
brothers and Princess Nótt are...are...$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Unfortunate but necessary losses.
For the sake of Niðavellir's future!
A worthy cause for sacrifice, isn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Necessary losses?! People are not
your playthings to do whatever you
want with!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|That is where we disagree, I'm afraid.
Let me demonstrate my point...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE13_10,0|$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Ngyah!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Try all you want! You stand no
chance against a weapon of my
immaculate design.$k$p$EFace_Smile|I'll allow you a moment to regain
your composure. I'll be inside when
you're ready.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wait! ...Eitri!$k$p

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She just...walked away. Is there
no way we can win against Eitri?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Hm... No, I think there is a way.
She told us herself, didn't she?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|...Oh, right! Gramr!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Gramr reveals its true power when
held by someone from the royal line
of Niðavellir, right?$k$pEitri believes the royal bloodline had
ended... But now we know that isn't
the case.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face|Yes... You're right!$k$p$EFace_Anger|...Watch over me, Brothers. I will
not let Eitri get away with what
she's done!$k$p$Sbs150|
